trans-unit.source: Provides a common base class for controls that can be triggers for <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> controls.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a string that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.ID"></xref> of the control that is a trigger for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID%2A> property must be set to the ID of a control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>, <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
A string that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.ID"></xref> of the control.
The default is an empty string ("").
Searches for the control specified in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID"></xref> property.
A Boolean value that indicates whether to search for the control recursively in naming containers that contain the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
A control that has the ID matching the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID"></xref> property.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID"></xref> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger"></xref> is `null` or empty.
The control with the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanelControlTrigger.ControlID"></xref> was not found.
